summary: A romantic comedy set in the world of battle re-enactments, about an irresponsible guy who has to shape up in order to win back his wife.
cast: Eddie Marsan|Ewen Bremner|Jessica Hynes|Bronagh Gallagher|Tim Healy|Paul Nicholls|Anne Reid|Joseph Hamilton|Chloe Hesar|Richard Ridings|Gary Sefton|Kevin Eldon|Sandra Voe|Matthew Leighton|Tom Smith|Oscar McDevitt|Rasmus Hardiker|Edward Tudor-Pole|Tim Potter|Aliese Kellner-Joyce|Colin Webb|George Hill|Chris Ryle Wright|Calum Chalmers|Phil Lester|Steve Ryland|Nick Ball|Jason Excell|Graeme Brookes|Joseph Ripley|Rosalyn Scanlon|Jonathan Garratt|Bobbie Roe|Damian Brooke|Michael Dorn|Joe Golby|Peter Holyoake|Ian Hughes|Christopher Key|Gregory Satterford|Marina Sirtis
title: Faintheart
